definition: sticky/glutinous/(Tw) to adhere/to stick on/to glue

sentences.english: Objective To study clinical presentations and complications of prolapse of gastric mucosa.

sentences.english: It has thin lamina propria and no glands.

sentences.english: Tan-yellow plaques are seen in the lower esophagus, along with mucosal hyperemia.

sentences.english: Clinically, it is characterized by severe mucosal erosions and various cutaneous lesions.

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the preparing technique of melatonin starch microspheres for intranasal administration.
